title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + June 6, 2015 IRE Tipsheet: Avoiding Prying Eyes
description: A tipsheet for journalists on protecting sources and communication by using various tools and strategies for masking metadata and content from being traced or analyzed.
